name: alstructurecreator
description: Create folder structure for AL projects

ALStructureCreator.AppSubfolderType.description: This configuration defines which type of application/object folder you want to create.

ALStructureCreator.CreateExtObjFolder.description: This configuration allows you to create extension subfolder for all application type object.

enumDescriptions: Create AL folder structure in project root folder
Create AL folder structure in new folder under project root
ALStructureCreator.ProjectFolderOption.description: This configuration allows you to create folder structure in the project root or in a new folder.

ALStructureCreator.ErrorOnExistFolder.description: This configuration allows to raise an error if the project folder already exists.
